resources.string: A bronchodilator that helps increase flow of air into the airways while it relaxes the muscles in the lungs.
A group of medications usually to help treat symptoms of discomfort occurring in the gastric system. This is usually given to patients who are experiencing heartburn or acid reflux.
A cephalosporin antibiotic. It is used to treat bacterial infections. It may also used before or during surgery to prevent infection.
Used to treat pain, fevers, and reduce inflammation. It also has secondary uses such as preventing heart attacks, strokes and chest pains if prescribed by a doctor.
A benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety disorders. It may also be used for nausea, migraines and seizures.
An antibiotic in the group of drugs called fluoroquinolone. This drug fights infection on the skin, in the sinuses, lungs or stomach.
An antihistamine used to treat allergy symptoms, hives, rashes and also can be used to help with sleep or migraines.
An antibiotic from the group called fluoroquinolones. It is a type of medicine that treats different bacterial infections in the body.
An alpha agonist. It is mainly used to treat high blood pressure but may also be used for alcohol, nicotine, or benzodiazepine withdrawal as well as migraines.
Used to treat inflammation in the body. It can be used for things such as swelling, allergic reactions, asthma, kidney problems, skin conditions, or flare-ups of MS.
Used to help treat heart failure as well as treat atrial fibrillation. It makes the heart beat much stronger and more regular.
Used during general anesthesia for procedures or anesthesia. It is also used in an ER or ICU setting while patients are using a breathing tube and ventilator for sedation.
Opioid pain medication used to treat moderate to severe pain.
An antipsychotic medicine used to treat schizophrenia, control motor and speak tics in Tourette’s syndrome and also used to control nausea.
is an anticoagulant (blood thinner) which prevents formation of blood clots in the veins, arteries or lungs.

A loop diuretic which treats water retention. Most commonly referred to as a “water pill”, it is used in those with CHF (congestive heart failure), liver disease, kidney disorders and high blood pressure.

In the class called beta blockers. It is used to treat chest pain, high blood pressure and heart failure. Using this medication to lower blood pressure can help to prevent strokes, kidney problems and heart attacks.
An anticoagulant medication which helps prevent formation of blood clots. It is also used to treat and/or prevent deep vein thrombosis (DVT) as well as blood clots in the lungs (pulmonary embolisms).
is an narcotic pain reliever used for moderate or severe pain. It can be taken orally, through an IV or as an injection into the muscle.
An NSAID (nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug) used to treat pain, reduce inflammation and reduce fevers.
A nitrate used to prevent chest pain (angina) which occurs when the heart does not get enough blood. It dilates the blood vessels to make it easier for blood to reach the heart.
An opioid pain medication with both acetaminophen (tylenol) an oxycodone. It is used to treat moderate to severe pain.
A medication used to help treat and prevent nausea and vomiting. It can also be used to help with sleep or with allergic symptoms like rash or itching.
Helps prevent unwanted blood clots. It is primarily used to prevent blood clots after a heart attack or stroke.
is a corticosteroid which prevents inflammation. This oral medication is mainly used for skin conditions, arthritis, breathing disorders, or allergic reactions.
A medication that speeds up how fast the stomach empties. It also may be used for heartburn or nausea and vomiting.
A cephalosporin antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of infections in the body.

A steroid which prevents inflammation. Given through an IV, this medication is used to treat arthritis, ulcerative colitis, nervous system disorders, lung conditions and many other allergic disorders.
Used to treat pain and fevers.
An NSAID (nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug) which reduces the pain and inflammation in the body.
A combination antibiotic that are used to fight against bacteria in the body.
A benzodiazepine, used to treat anxiety, alcohol withdrawal, or muscle spasms.
An opioid pain medication with both acetaminophen (tylenol) and hydrocodone. It is used to treat moderate to severe pain.
An antibiotic used to treat lung infections such as pneumonia, skin infections, ear infections and pelvic inflammatory disease (PID) in women.
Used to prevent or treat nausea and vomiting.

Combination antibiotic used to fight against bacertia in the body. It is commonly used for urinary tract infections, joint infections, skin infections, pneumonia as well as infections in the stomach. It is not uncommon to receive Zosyn in conjunction with other antibiotics.
is an anti arrhythmic drug used to treat irregular heartbeats, slowing the rate of the heart and converting it to a normal rhythm.
is a penicillin antibiotic used to treat bacertia in the body. It is primarily used for tonsilitis, bronchitis, pneumonia, gonorrhea and infections of the ear, nose, skin and urinary infections.
is a medication in the drug class of sedatives. It’s used to help people with insomnia.

is a medication in the group of drugs called Beta Blockers. These medications affect the heart and circulation of the blood. It is used to treat high blood pressure, chest pain and reduce the chances of a heart attack.
is an antibiotic used to treat bacteria within the body. It’s in the penicillin group of drugs. It’s commonly used for sinusitis, pneumonia, urinary infections and bronchitis.
is an antibiotic used to treat different types of bacertia in the body. It’s commonly used for urinary infections, bronchitis, diarrhea, or ear infections.
is an antibiotic that is used to treat bacterial infections in the body

is an anticoagulant, also known as a blood thinner. It is used to prevent strokes, blood clots, and prevent heart attacks. If you’re taking coumadin, you will often need to have your blood checked to make sure your INR (blood test) is within a therapeutic range.
is a medication used for a wide range of symptoms. It can be used to treat anxiety, nausea and vomiting as well as psychotic disorders and migraine headaches.
is an anticonvulsant drug. It’s used to slow impulses in the brain that can cause seizures.
is a calcium channel blocker medication. It is used to treat high blood pressure, chest pain and abnormal heart rhythms such as atrial fibrillation.

is drug which helps improve the pumping strength of the heart which creates better blood flow throughout the body. It is used to treat low blood pressure during a heart attack, kidney failure, heart failure, or other conditions.

is a medication used to treat low blood pressure, wheezing, and serious allergic reactions. It may be used in the emergency setting by medical professionals or by those with serious allergies to insect bites, stings, or foods (epi pen)
is an narcotic medication primarily used to treat pain.
is an antibiotic used to fight against bacteria in the body.

is an alpha-blocker medication that helps make it easier to urinate. It does so by helping to relax the muscles in the bladder and the prostate. It’s frequently used in cases of kidney stones or enlarged prostates.

is in the group of drugs called cephalosporins. It is an antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections in the body. A physician may prescribe Reflex to treat skin infections, urinary tract infections, as well as respiratory infections and others.

is an antibiotic in the group of drugs called Floroquinolones. They are used to fight against bacterial infections in the body. Frequently this drug is used to treat bronchitis, pneumonia, kidney infections, or during early treatment of sepsis.
is a medication in the class of drugs called Ace Inhibitors. This medication is primarily used to treat high blood pressure.

is a medication used to reverse the effects of opioid medication. It is most frequently used when a person been given or used too much of an opioid medication and is exhibiting the effects of opioid overdose such as altered mental status, decreased breathing pattern, or drowsiness.
is opioid class medication used to treat pain.
is most commonly used for bladder and urinary tract spasms. It will help treat overactive bladder, incontinence and frequent urination.

is commonly known as a “water pill”. It’s different from other “water pills” in that is does not rid the body of potassium. It is commonly used to treat congestive heart failure or excessive edema (water retention most commonly seen in the lower legs).
is a benzodiazepine used for mild sedation during medical procedures.
is a benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety, depression and panic disorders.
